body_text:
@Osmose So the reason I like depending on selectedSurvey for what to show there is that it will toggle between showing a survey/showing the defaults automatically since it's updating with each state change.
If I add a showDefaults method, I'd honestly just want it to unset the selectedSurvey like I'm already doing. That on it's own might still be better, since showDefaults is more explicit/reads more semantically. Do you imagine that method doing anything different or is that the solution you had in mind?
